name: .P2G File Extension
summary: Learn about .P2G files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Disc image project created by Power2Go, a disc authoring and burning application; saved in an XML format and stores CD, DVD, or Blu-ray disc project settings; used for authoring audio, video, data, or mixed mode discs.

content: P2G files allow users to save project settings and edit the disc project at a later time. They can be used for generating disc images in the proprietary .P2I format or in the standard .ISO format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
